card.text: ELITE (while all mortals in this mortal's party have ELITE, the party cannot be blocked except by mortals with ELITE)

card.name: Magnetic Personality
card.text: {T} = Draw a card.

card.name: Deluxe Butler
card.text:
PRICEY (cost: {D}) Enter - You may deploy a non-[E] standard resource.
Attack - You may void a card in an opponent's trashpile.

card.name: Personnel Consultant
card.text: Enter - You may pick an opponent's depleted mortal, inflict 1 damage to it. If it is destroyed by that damage, draw cards equal to its non-[A] influence requirement minus 1.

card.name: Vitality Harvester
card.text:
UPGRADE (reveal this from your hand, sacrifice a card that shares a type with this card = Deploy this faceup.)
Attack - All of your attacking mortals gain +1/+1 this turn.

card.name: Chief Morale Officer
card.text: Enter - Your mortals gain +0/+1 this turn and this inflicts 2 damage to each depleted mortal.

card.name: Unexpected Scandalizer

{D}, {T} = Pick a depleted mortal, inflict 3 damage to it.
{T}, {T} one of your mortals = inflict 1 damage to a depleted mortal.

card.name: Public Humiliation
card.text: Pick an attacking mortal and inflict 4 damage to it.

card.name: Tactical Disable
card.text:
Destroy a mortal or item that used an activated ability this turn. Put this onto the battlezone under its owner's control as a facedown resource.
2[D] - Reveal this while it's a facedown resource, {T} your Mastermind = Put this into your hand.

card.name: Perfect Foresight
card.text: Cancel a trap being deployed. (A trap being deployed facedown, not a trap being flipped up during a trap check.)

card.name: Fit In
card.text: A mortal gains ELITE this turn. You may deploy a standard resource. (While all mortals in this mortal's party have ELITE, the party cannot be blocked except by mortals with ELITE)

card.name: Envious Overhaul
card.text: Draw cards equal to the number of mortals your opponents control, then discard that many cards.

card.name: Triple Threat
card.text: Pick any number of depleted mortals, inflict 3 damage divided as you choose among them.

card.name: Massive Exposé
card.text:
COST: Choose a number for X. Absorb X rep.
Inflict X damage to each opponent's depleted mortals.

card.name: Status Symbol
card.text:
Attached mortal gets +1/+1 and gains ELITE.
(Gear can be attached to your mortal when it enters the battlezone or when your mortal enters the battlezone if the gear is unattached. You may use a {D} to attach the gear to any of your mortals.)

card.name: Gala Invitation
card.text:
At the end of combat, if any of your mortals with ELITE hit this combat, you may deploy a standard resource.
{T} your Mastermind, sacrifice this = Draw a card.

card.name: Aton Usoro
card.text:
Enter - Search your deck for a standard [E] resource and put it onto the battlezone. Draw a card. Gain 2 rep.
{D} = Draw a card, deploy a card, or begin combat.
{T} = Deploy a mortal with influence requirement 4 or greater.
{T}, sacrifice a resource = Look at your facedown cards in the void and your rep, you may reveal up to two mortals from among those cards. Put them into your hand.

card.text:

You may only attack with 2 or fewer mortals this combat. {T} = Draw a card. Put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Posthumous Betrayal
card.text: Put an opponent's mortal from their trashpile onto the battlezone under your control if it was trashed this turn. Deplete it.

card.name: Debt to the Dead
card.text: If one or more of your mortals were trashed this turn, you may pick up to 2 mortals and destroy them.

card.name: Dark Bargains
card.text: Each opponent discards a card. You may choose a card in your hand and gain it as a rep. (When you gain a rep, shuffle them.)

card.name: A Different Kind of Respect
card.text: Look at your rep. You may shuffle them into your deck and then gain that many rep. If you don't, shuffle your rep. Draw a card. (When you gain a rep shuffle them.)

card.name: Dark Remembrance
card.text: Gain a card in your trashpile as a rep. Void this event. (When you gain a rep, shuffle them.)

card.name: Enlighten the Undead
card.text: Put a mortal from your trashpile into your hand. Look at a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the mortal's influence requirement and you may reveal a mortal. If you do, put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

{D}, {T}, Put a temperature counter on this, Discard a non-resource card = Destroy a mortal, then if this has 3 or more temperature counters on it, draw a card and sacrifice this.
